_sText:
This is the "Bomb/Defuse"-Version of the Valve-Map "cs_italy" Cs_italy is a nice map, but because of the hostages the gameplay had to suffer. Now this has changed. I created a very nice DE-Version auf this map. The bombspots and the spawn-zones are well-thought-out for optimal fun in Game. This map has... - a map-overview (the little map on the top). I think it's very important and nice. - named zones - nice spawn-points and bomb-zones - a navigation-file I hope you like it^^ PS: Of course it's playable with bots Like the standard map
Check out my other maps: de_compound de_dust2_night_fix aim_ice-stylez_v2 aim_para-stylez_v2 aim_dust-stylez_v2
